note:
I'm a simple and compassionate Citizen of the Earth.

And have been online almost since the internet began with one hope, and message of it.

Most of the things I post are from a personal book of observations on humanity I've been compiling since I was 14, titled "Wisdom, Warning, and Tyranny." With some from a plan to assure and forward humanity titled "A Future of the Brave."

But please be warned that internet searches for me and "Wisdom, Warning, and Tyranny", or "A Future of the Brave" are often misdirected to other, possibly dangerous, websites. And the links are often very sophisticated, even including some of my most popular observations in the results.

I understand that's odd, and given that I'm really no one I'm just as surprised as you.

In any case my old website, and "A Future of the Brave", are found at the most obvious address - http://www.searingtruth.com

Please don't follow any other links unless you know where they lead.

[ 商品について ]

商品の状態には細心の注意を払っておりますが、完璧にチェックすることができない場合もございます。予めご了承ください。中古品であるため、美品をお求めの方はご遠慮いただきますようお願い申し上げます。

※ペット、喫煙者はおりません。

[ お取引について ]

取引のメッセージの有無や評価の遅延により、評価を低くすることはございません。お忙しい中、商品をご購入いただけることに感謝しておりますので、お忙しい方も安心してご購入ください。

note:
Independent 60+ Dutch security researcher. I hate injustice, propaganda and discrimination. I try to be as objective as possible.

Mission: make the internet a safer place!

Primary focus: #impersonation (i.e. when #authentication fails).

Infosec: #passkeys #certificates #phishing #MFA #2FA #OTP #TOTP #DMARC #cryptography #PKI #androidPasskeys #accountLockout #ATO #accountTakeOver #privacy #clientSideScanning #CSS #domainNameLaundering #letsEncrypt #DV

Other: #Gaza #Ukraine #covidApps #coronaMelder #coronaCheck #vaccination (I took anti-Covid shots through 2022)

Notes:
• Don't auto-trust all of this. It may be a spoof, even if "I" say it's not (i.e. my account may be hacked).

• Judge me on my thoughts (not my physical me), as revealed in my writings.

• Using URL-shorteners (i.e buff.ly) on infosec.exchange? I mute you.

note:
Here to complain about how Wikipedia's attempts at balance often lead to bias.

Wikipedia is a lot more balanced than most other sources in English. But when a situation is very imbalance, balance is not enough.

For example, the concept of things needing to be "notable" to be in Wikipedia means that in English Wikipedia 1,139 deaths on 7 October 2023 get the same weight as over 35,000 deaths since.

(profile pic is "Christ in the Rubble" by Rev. Dr. Munther Isaac, see pinned post for banner)

An ex-Marine Engineering Artificer with the Royal Navy. Also worked as a Process Controller for Greater Manchester Waste at Bolton Thermal Recovery Facility. I was a member of the Green Party, and have supported the WWF, UNICEF, FOE, Greenpeace, WDM and other NGO's in trying to bring about change for the better.

EpicNews.ca - Epic News from Canada and all over the world!

...just another completely indie Canadian news site balancing between the sensational and what really matters.

We try to bring the focus towards humanities, environment, politics, sports, technology, travel and local Canadian news from across the country.

But may end up with the occasional news story about Drake. Just because he's Canadian too.

And we do love hockey and poutine!
